text:
tried the dry minced pork noodles, priced at $7.20 SGD with an additional $1.20 SGD for extra small fish. The dish had a sweet flavor profile, which was a departure from the more savory noodles I’m accustomed to enjoying in Bedok. Unfortunately, the taste was noticeably enhanced with MSG, detracting from the natural flavors I was looking forward to. While the presentation was appealing, the use of MSG and the additional charge for a small amount of fish made the meal less satisfying overall, both in terms of taste and value.

Taste : sweet like McDonald sweet and sour sauce , should replace the girl that makes this food
Found a strand of hair inside my tomyum beehoon soup .. Thinking is a strand of prawn feelers ended up is a strand of hair .. Disappointed ..
Located within the newly opened kopitiam. There is an ongoing promotion of 1pc free dumpling
Love the soup. Have been eating this Ban Mee from another outlet till chance upon it here.
难吃. Ban mian without fried onions. And tasteless? Throw qiu lian ban mian de face. Previously the ban mian before renovation so much nicer.
